analysisEngineMetaData.name: RelationshipSentenceLineWriter
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Write sentences containing semantic relationships to an output stream, separating each sentence by newline.
In general, these annotations should be RelationshipAnnotation types holding a single SyntaxAnnotation (the sentence) as source and any number of SemanticAnnotation types (the entities mentioned in the sentence forming a relation) as targets.

configurationParameter.name: OutputDirectory
configurationParameter.description: Optional output directory; output files named as the inputfiles with .txt appended will be created in the given directory.

configurationParameter.name: OverwriteFiles
configurationParameter.description: Allow overwriting of existing files in the output directory (if not allowed, the file name extension is prepended with a dot followed by a sequential integer until the file name is new).

configurationParameter.name: PrintToStdout
configurationParameter.description: Independent of file output, also print the results to stdout (default is true if no OutputDirectory is given, false otherwise).

configurationParameter.name: Encoding
configurationParameter.description: Use the given encoding for writing to output file (default: platform encoding)

configurationParameter.name: opennlp.uima.SentenceType
configurationParameter.description: fully qualified name of the sentence annotation type

configurationParameter.name: RelationshipNamespace
configurationParameter.description: The namespace used for the relevant RelationshipAnnotations
